clue: Evil overwhelms Middle-earth adventuring type, in classic fantasy
explanation: Evil (BAD) overwhelms middle (of) earth (R), giving BARD. BARD is an adventuring "type" (or class), in classic fantasy (esp. tabletop games)!
hints: "Middle-earth" is one of those words that's giving you both an instruction, and also the letters that the instruction is acting on.
We'll need to find another word for "evil".
The definition this time is "adventuring type, in classic fantasy".
